whyNow.title: Why Start Your Drone Career Now?
content: The Transport & Logistics sector is experiencing unprecedented growth, representing ~77% of the drone market by 2043.
Early adopters are positioning themselves for maximum career opportunities as the industry scales.
Current market conditions offer the perfect entry point with established training pathways and growing demand.
Government support and regulatory clarity provide a stable foundation for career development.
The next 5 years will see exponential growth - those who start now will have significant competitive advantages.
